sent.orig: Improve experiment device and experiment method and make experiment concentrated green and miniature.
sent.trans: 改进实验装置和实验方法，使实验高效、绿色、微型化。

sent.orig: The laboratory experiment could be divided into two types, which are liquid experiment and gas experiment.
sent.trans: 实验室试验法分为液相试验法和气相试验法。

sent.orig: It consists of three stages: basic experiment, classic experiment and exploratory experiment.
sent.trans: 新的药理学实验包括基础性实验、经典性实验、探索性实验三个阶段。

sent.orig: She did experiment after experiment. There was failure, a little success.
sent.trans: 她一次又一次地试验，失败了，稍有成功，又失败了， 再获得更进一步的成功。

sent.orig: Methords: Observed sleep experiment, central excitation experiment, hypoxia tolerance after giving drugs 5 times.
sent.trans: 方法：灌胃给药5次，观察睡眠实验、中枢兴奋实验和耐缺氧实验。
